description.raw:
There was an issue recording and then playing back log files that contained SDF 1.6 which didn't conform to SDF 1,7 expectations. For example, [this tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=log_filtering&cat=tools_utilities) would successfully record the log file, but Gazebo would crash on playback.

This PR, together with [this SDF PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/655/) makes that tutorial playback the log file correctly, with the only consequence being a few errors printed:

~~~
[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
~~~

This PR, together with this SDF PR makes that tutorial playback the log file correctly, with the only consequence being a few errors printed:

[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
[Err] [World.cc:190] Error Code 8 Msg: A <script> element is missing a child <uri> element, or the <uri> element is empty.
